     TARGET_TABLE                          character varying(50)
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
;

     RETAIL_PRICE                          numeric(9,2),
     MANUFACTURER                          character varying(100),
     BRAND                                 character varying(30),
     TITLE                                 character varying(100),

     DISPENSING_FEE                        numeric(9,2),

     PET_MEDICAL_CONDITIONS                character varying(100),

     VETERINARY_NAME                       character varying(50),

     VET_CITY                              character varying(25),
     VET_STATE                             character varying(5),
     VET_ZIP                               character varying(10),
     VET_PHONE_NUMBER                      character varying(20),
     LOAD_TSTMP                            timestamp                         default "TIMESTAMP"('now(0)'::"VARCHAR")
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (ALLIVET_ORDER_CODE, ALLIVET_SKU)
ORGANIZE   ON (INVOICE_POSTING_DATE)
;

CREATE TABLE  CKB_STR_STORE
(
     CKB_DB_STORE_KEY                         integer                             not null,
     STORE_NBR                                integer,
     ADDRESS_COUNTRY                          character varying(50),
     DB_DATE_EFFECTIVE_FROM                   timestamp,
     DB_DATE_EFFECTIVE_TO                     timestamp,
     LOCATION_ID                              integer,
     LOAD_DT                                  date,
     UPDATE_DT                                date
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
ORGANIZE   ON (LOCATION_ID, DB_DATE_EFFECTIVE_FROM, DB_DATE_EFFECTIVE_TO)
;

ALTER TABLE CKB_STR_STORE ADD PRIMARY KEY (CKB_DB_STORE_KEY);

\echo *****  Creating table:  "DAYS"

CREATE TABLE  DAYS
(
     DAY_DT                                   timestamp                           not null,
     BUSINESS_DAY_FLAG                        character(1),
     HOLIDAY_FLAG                             character(1),
     DAY_OF_WK_NAME                           character(9),
     DAY_OF_WK_NAME_ABBR                      character(3),
     DAY_OF_WK_NBR                            byteint,
     CAL_DAY_OF_MO_NBR                        byteint,
     CAL_DAY_OF_YR_NBR                        smallint,
     CAL_WK                                   integer,
     CAL_WK_NBR                               byteint,
     CAL_MO                                   integer,
     CAL_MO_NBR                               byteint,
     CAL_MO_NAME                              character(9),
     CAL_MO_NAME_ABBR                         character(3),
     CAL_QTR                                  integer,
     CAL_QTR_NBR                              byteint,
     CAL_HALF                                 integer,
     CAL_YR                                   smallint,
     FISCAL_DAY_OF_MO_NBR                     byteint,
     FISCAL_DAY_OF_YR_NBR                     smallint,
     FISCAL_WK                                integer,
     FISCAL_WK_NBR                            byteint,
     FISCAL_MO                                integer,
     FISCAL_MO_NBR                            byteint,
     FISCAL_MO_NAME                           character(9),
     FISCAL_MO_NAME_ABBR                      character(3),
     FISCAL_QTR                               integer,
     FISCAL_QTR_NBR                           byteint,
     FISCAL_HALF                              integer,
     FISCAL_YR                                smallint,
     LYR_WEEK_DT                              timestamp                           not null,
     LWK_WEEK_DT                              timestamp                           not null,

     CST_TIME_CONV_AMT                        numeric(6,6)                        not null  default '0.041665'::"NUMERIC",
     CST_TIME_CONV_HRS                        byteint                             not null  default 1,
     CS0_TIME_CONV_AMT                        numeric(6,6)                        not null  default '0.041665'::"NUMERIC",
     CS0_TIME_CONV_HRS                        byteint                             not null  default 1,
     MST_TIME_CONV_AMT                        numeric(6,6)                        not null  default 0,

)

(
     RESULT_ID                                  bigint                              not null,

     MEMBER_GROUP                               character varying(255),
     PARTICIPANT_DETAILS                        character varying(200),
     HOSTNAME                                   character varying(200),
     IP_ADDRESS                                 character varying(200),
     SIGNATURE                                  character varying(50),
     STILL_GOING_FLAG                           byteint,
     STATUS_ID                                  integer,
     SECTIONS_CNT                               integer,
     MAX_SCORE_NBR                              bigint,
     TOTAL_SCORE_NBR                            bigint,

     SPECIAL_2                                  character varying(200),
     SPECIAL_3                                  character varying(200),
     SPECIAL_4                                  character varying(200),
     SPECIAL_5                                  character varying(200),

     SPECIAL_10                                 character varying(200),

     SCORE_RESULT                               character varying(200),
     SCORE_RESULT_NBR                           bigint,
     PASSED_FLAG                                byteint,
     PERCENTAGE_SCORE_NBR                       integer,
     SCHEDULE_NAME                              character varying(200),
     MONITORED_FLAG                             byteint,
     MONITOR_NAME                               character varying(200),
     TIME_LIMIT_DISABLED_FLAG                   byteint,
     DISABLED_BY                                character varying(200),
     IMAGE_REF                                  character varying(255),
     SCOREBAND_ID                               bigint                              not null,
     FIRST_NAME                                 character varying(200),
     LAST_NAME                                  character varying(200),
     PRIMARY_EMAIL                              character varying(255),
     RESTRICT_PART_FLAG                         byteint,
     RESTRICT_ADMIN_FLAG                        byteint,
     R_PART_FROM_DT                             timestamp,
     R_PART_TO_DT                               timestamp,
     R_ADMIN_FROM_DT                            timestamp,
     R_ADMIN_TO_DT                              timestamp,
     COURSE_NAME                                character varying(1020),

     MEMBER_SUB_GROUP_9                         character varying(200),

)
DISTRIBUTE ON (RESULT_ID)

     START_INV_AMT                              numeric(24,12),
     END_INV_NORM_QTY                           numeric(24,12),

     END_INV_QTY                                numeric(24,12),
     END_INV_AMT                                numeric(24,12),
     ADJ_INV_QTY                                numeric(24,12),
     ADJ_INV_AMT                                numeric(24,12),
     MOVEMENT_RECEIPT_QTY                       numeric(24,12),
     MOVEMENT_RECEIPT_AMT                       numeric(24,12),
     EP_UPDATE_TSTMP                            timestamp                           not null,
     UPDATE_TSTMP                               timestamp                           not null,
     LOAD_TSTMP                                 timestamp                           default "TIMESTAMP"('now(0)'::"VARCHAR")
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (EP_VERSION, SAP_CLASS_ID)
ORGANIZE   ON (WEEK_DT)
;

CREATE TABLE  LOCATION
(
     LOCATION_ID                                      integer                             not null,
     COMPANY_DESC                                     character(25),
     COMPANY_ID                                       integer,
     DATE_CLOSED                                      timestamp,
     DATE_OPEN    timestamp,
     DATE_LOC_ADDED                                   timestamp                           default "TIMESTAMP"('now'::"VARCHAR"),
     DATE_LOC_DELETED                                 timestamp                           default '9999-12-31'::DATE,
     DATE_LOC_REFRESHED                               timestamp,
     DISTRICT_DESC                                    character(40),
     DISTRICT_ID                                      character(18),
     PRICE_AD_ZONE_DESC                               character(40),
     PRICE_AD_ZONE_ID                                 character(18),
     PRICE_ZONE_DESC                                  character(40),
     PRICE_ZONE_ID                                    character(18),
     REGION_DESC                                      character(40),
     REGION_ID    character(18),
     REPL_DC_NBR                                      integer                             default '0'::"NUMERIC",
     REPL_FISH_DC_NBR                                 integer                             default '0'::"NUMERIC",
     REPL_FWD_DC_NBR                                  integer                             default '0'::"NUMERIC",
     STORE_CTRY_ABBR                                  character(3)                        not null,
     STORE_CTRY                                       character(15),
     STORE_NAME                                       character(20),
     STORE_NBR    integer,
     STORE_OPEN_CLOSE_FLAG                            character(1),
     STORE_STATE_ABBR                                 character(3),
     STORE_TYPE_DESC                                  character(30),
     STORE_TYPE_ID                                    character(4)                        not null,
     EQUINE_MERCH                                     character(30),
     DATE_GR_OPEN                                     timestamp,
     SQ_FEET_RETAIL                                   double precision,
     SQ_FEET_TOTAL                                    double precision,
     BP_COMPANY_NBR                                   smallint,
     BP_GL_ACCT                                       smallint,
     TP_LOC_FLAG                                      character(1),
     TP_ACTIVE_CNT                                    byteint,
     TP_START_DT                                      timestamp,
     SITE_ADDRESS                                     character varying(30),
     SITE_CITY    character varying(25),
     SITE_POSTAL_CD                                   character varying(10),
     SITE_MAIN_TELE_NO                                character varying(16),
     SITE_GROOM_TELE_NO                               character varying(16)
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
;

CREATE TABLE  MARD_PRE
(
     MANDT        integer                             not null,
     MATNR        integer                             not null,
     WERKS        integer                             not null,
     LGORT        character varying(4)                not null  default ' '::"NVARCHAR",
     LABST        integer                             not null  default 0,
     INSME        integer                             not null  default 0,
     SPEME        integer                             not null  default 0
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (MANDT, MATNR, WERKS)
ORGANIZE   ON (WERKS, MATNR, MANDT)
;

\echo
\echo *****  Adding Primary Key Constraint:  MARD_PRE
ALTER TABLE MARD_PRE ADD Constraint MARD_PRE_1235_PK PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, MATNR, WERKS);

\echo
\echo *****  Creating table:  "MA_EVENT"

CREATE TABLE  MA_EVENT
(
     MA_EVENT_ID                                      integer                             not null,
     OFFER_ID     bigint,
     SAP_DEPT_ID                                      integer,
     PRODUCT_ID                                       integer,
     COUNTRY_CD                                       character(3),
     START_DT     date                                not null,
     END_DT       date                                not null,
     MA_EVENT_TYPE_ID                                 integer                             not null,
     MA_EVENT_SOURCE_ID                               byteint                             not null,
     LOCATION_ID                                      integer,
     MOVEMENT_ID                                      integer,
     VALUATION_CLASS_CD                               character(4),
     GL_ACCT_NBR                                      integer,
     LOCATION_TYPE_ID                                 byteint,
     ROYALTY_BRAND_ID                                 integer,
     BRAND_CD     character varying(4),
     MA_FORMULA_CD                                    character varying(25),
     FISCAL_MO    integer,
     SAP_CATEGORY_ID                                  integer,
     FROM_LOCATION_ID                                 integer,
     SOURCE_VENDOR_ID                                 bigint,
     COMPANY_ID                                       integer,
     MA_EVENT_DESC                                    character varying(100),
     EM_VENDOR_FUNDING_ID                             bigint,
     EM_COMMENT                                       character varying(4000),
     EM_BILL_ALT_VENDOR_FLAG                          character(1),
     EM_ALT_VENDOR_ID                                 character varying(5),
     EM_ALT_VENDOR_NAME                               character varying(35),
     EM_ALT_VENDOR_COUNTRY_CD                         character(3),
     EM_VENDOR_ID                                     bigint,
     EM_VENDOR_NAME                                   character varying(35),
     EM_VENDOR_COUNTRY_CD                             character(3),
     VENDOR_NAME_TXT                                  character varying(1000),
     MA_PCT_IND                                       byteint,
     MA_AMT       numeric(19,4),
     MA_MAX_AMT                                       numeric(19,4),
     UPDATE_DT    date                                not null,
     LOAD_DT      date                                not null
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (MA_EVENT_ID)
;

\echo
\echo *****  Adding Primary Key Constraint:  MA_EVENT
ALTER TABLE MA_EVENT ADD Constraint MA_EVENT_NEW_PK PRIMARY KEY (MA_EVENT_ID);

\echo
\echo *****  Creating table:  "ON_ORDER"

CREATE TABLE  ON_ORDER
(
     ON_ORDER_CD                                      character(1)                         not null,
     ON_ORDER_DESC                                    character varying(40)
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
;

\echo
\echo *****  Adding Primary Key Constraint:  ON_ORDER
ALTER TABLE ON_ORDER ADD Constraint ON_ORDER_PK_IDX PRIMARY KEY (ON_ORDER_CD);

     SERVICE_START_DT                                 timestamp,
     SERVICE_END_DT                                   timestamp,

     PETCOUNT     bigint,

     EXCH_RATE_PCNT                                   numeric(15,6),
     WEEK_DT      timestamp,
     FISCAL_YR    smallint,
     FISCAL_MO    integer,
     FISCAL_WK    integer,
     LOAD_DT      timestamp
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (TP_INVOICE_NBR)
;

\echo *****  Creating table:  "PRODUCT"

CREATE TABLE  PRODUCT
(
     PRODUCT_ID                                       integer                              not null,
     ALT_DESC     character(40),
     ANIMAL       character(30),
     ANIMALSIZE                                       character(30),
     BRAND_NAME                                       character(30),
     BUM_QTY      numeric(5,0),
     BUYER_ID     character varying(5),
     BUYER_NAME                                       character(30),
     CTRY_ORIGIN                                      character(15),
     DATE_DISC_START                                  timestamp,
     DATE_DISC_END                                    timestamp,
     DATE_FIRST_INV                                   timestamp,
     DATE_FIRST_SALE                                  timestamp,
     DATE_LAST_INV                                    timestamp,
     DATE_LAST_SALE                                   timestamp,
     DATE_PROD_ADDED                                  timestamp,
     DATE_PROD_DELETED                                timestamp,
     DATE_PROD_REFRESHED                              timestamp,
     DEPTH        numeric(9,3),
     DIM_UNITS    character(10),
     FLAVOR       character(30),
     HEIGHT       numeric(9,3),
     HTS_CODE     bigint,
     HTS_DESC     character(40),
     IMPORT_FLAG                                      character(1),
     MFGREP_NAME                                      character(30),
     OWNBRAND_FLAG                                    character(1),
     PRIMARY_UPC                                      bigint,
     PRIMARY_VENDOR_ID                                bigint,
     PURCH_GROUP_ID                                   integer,
     PURCH_GROUP_NAME                                 character(20),
     SAP_CATEGORY_DESC                                character(20),
     SAP_CLASS_ID                                     integer,
     SAP_DEPT_ID                                      integer,
     SAP_DIVISION_ID                                  integer,
     CONTENTS     numeric(9,3),
     CONTENTS_UNITS                                   character(10),
     SKU_DESC     character(40),
     SKU_NBR      integer,
     SKU_NBR_REF                                      integer,
     STATELINE_FLAG                                   character(1),
     SUM_COST_NTL                                     numeric(9,3),
     SUM_RETAIL_NTL                                   numeric(9,3),
     TUM_QTY      numeric(5,0),
     VENDOR_SUB_RANGE                                 numeric(5,0),
     VOLUME       numeric(9,3),
     VOLUME_UNITS                                     character(10),
     WEIGHT_GROSS                                     numeric(9,3),
     WEIGHT_NET                                       numeric(9,3),
     WEIGHT_UNITS                                     character(10),
     WIDTH        numeric(9,3),
     CATEGORY_DESC                                    character(20),
     CATEGORY_ID                                      integer                              not null,
     VENDOR_STYLE_NBR                                 character(35),
     PRIMARY_VENDOR_NAME                              character(35),
     COLOR        character(30),
     FLAVOR2      character(30),
     POND_FLAG    character(1),
     PRODUCT_SIZE                                     character(30),
     DATE_INIT_MKDN                                   timestamp,
     ARTICLE_TYPE                                     character(4),
     SAP_CLASS_DESC                                   character(40),
     SAP_DEPT_DESC                                    character(40),
     SAP_DIVISION_DESC                                character(40),
     SEASON_DESC                                      character(20),
     SEASON_ID    character(4),
     SAP_CATEGORY_ID                                  integer                              not null,
     PLAN_GROUP_DESC                                  character(40),
     PLAN_GROUP_ID                                    integer                              not null,
     STATUS_ID    character(2),
     STATUS_NAME                                      character(30),
     OLD_ARTICLE_NBR                                  character varying(18),
     TAX_CLASS_ID                                     character(1)
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (PRODUCT_ID)

     QUERY_START_TSTMP                                timestamp                            not null,
     QUERY_END_TSTMP                                  timestamp,

     ERROR_NBR    integer,
     ERROR_TX     character varying(200),
     ROWS_AFFECTED                                    bigint,
     ROWS_INSERTED                                    bigint,
     ROWS_UPDATED                                     bigint,
     ROWS_DELETED                                     bigint,
     EXEC_USER    character varying(20)
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
;

     WEEK_DT      timestamp                            not null,
     SAP_DEPT_ID                                      integer                              not null,
     LOCATION_ID                                      integer                              not null,
     STORE_COMP_FLAG                                  byteint                              not null,
     NET_SALES_AMT                                    numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     PHONE_NET_SALES_AMT                              numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     PPCARD_NET_SALES_AMT                             numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     NET_SALES_COST                                   numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     NET_SALES_QTY                                    numeric(9,0)                         not null,
     SALES_MARGIN_AMT                                 numeric(10,2)                        not null,
     NET_DISCOUNT_AMT                                 numeric(9,2)                         not null,
     NET_LOYAL_DISCOUNT_AMT                           numeric(9,2)                         not null,
     NET_RETURN_AMT                                   numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     EXCH_RATE_PCT                                    numeric(9,6)                         not null,
     LYR_STORE_COMP_FLAG                              byteint                              not null,
     LYR_NET_SALES_AMT                                numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     LYR_PHONE_NET_SALES_AMT                          numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     LYR_PPCARD_NET_SALES_AMT                         numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     LYR_NET_SALES_COST                               numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     LYR_NET_SALES_QTY                                numeric(9,0)                         not null,
     LYR_SALES_MARGIN_AMT                             numeric(10,2)                        not null,
     LYR_NET_DISCOUNT_AMT                             numeric(9,2)                         not null,
     LYR_NET_LOYAL_DISCOUNT_AMT                       numeric(9,2)                         not null,
     LYR_NET_RETURN_AMT                               numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     LYR_EXCH_RATE_PCT                                numeric(9,6)                         not null,
     L2YR_NET_SALES_AMT                               numeric(11,2)                        not null,
     L2YR_EXCH_RATE_PCT                               numeric(9,6)                         not null,
     LOAD_DT      timestamp                            not null
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (SAP_DEPT_ID, LOCATION_ID)
ORGANIZE   ON (WEEK_DT)
;

     SALON_ACADEMY_TYPE_ID                            integer,
     SALON_ACADEMY_TYPE_DESC                          character varying(20),
     APPROVED_BY_DISTRICT_LEADER_FLAG                 byteint,
     UPDATE_TSTMP                                     timestamp                            not null,
     LOAD_TSTMP                                       timestamp                            not null
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (SALON_ACADEMY_ID)
;

(

     SL_ZONE      character varying(4),
     SL_AISLE     character varying(4),

     SL_LEVEL     character varying(4),

     SL_HT        numeric(13,2),
     SL_WIDTH     numeric(13,2),
     SL_DEPTH     numeric(13,2),
     SL_WT_LIMIT                                      numeric(13,2),
     SL_HT_OVERRIDE                                   smallint,
     SL_WIDTH_OVERRIDE                                smallint,
     SL_DEPTH_OVERRIDE                                smallint,
     SL_MAX_LN_OVR                                    smallint,
     SL_MAX_ST_OVR                                    smallint,
     SL_MAX_SC_OVR                                    smallint,
     SL_MAX_HC_OVR                                    smallint,
     SL_MAX_LW_OVR                                    numeric(12,2),
     SL_MAX_STACK                                     smallint,
     SL_MAX_SIDE_CLEAR                                numeric(12,2),
     SL_MAX_HT_CLEAR                                  numeric(12,2),
     SL_MAX_LANE_WT                                   numeric(12,2),
     SL_PROCESSED                                     smallint,
     SL_LOCK_REASON                                   character varying(15),
     SL_LOCK      smallint,
     SL_WT_LIMIT_OVERRIDE                             smallint,
     SL_LABEL_POS                                     numeric(12,2),
     SL_LABEL_POS_OVRRIDE                             smallint,
     SL_LEFT_SLOT                                     bigint,
     UPDATE_DT    date,
     LOAD_DT      date
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
;

     LOAD_TSTMP                                       timestamp
)
DISTRIBUTE ON (SMS_APPOINTMENT_ID)

     SHIP_PACKED_UNITS                                numeric(9,2),
     SHIP_SHIPPED_QTY                                 numeric(13,5),
     SHIP_SHIPPED_AMT                                 numeric(13,5),
     SHIP_CANCEL_QTY                                  numeric(9,2),
     PUTAWAY_TASK_CNT                                 integer,
     REPL_TASK_CNT                                    integer,
     ORDFILL_TASK_CNT                                 integer,
     SHIP_CNT     integer,
     PO_CNT       integer,
     PO_LINE_CNT                                      integer,
     ASN_CNT      integer,
     AUDIT_TASK_CNT                                   integer,
     WAVE_CNT     integer,

     ASNS_NOT_VERFD_GT_24HRS                          integer,
     LPNS_DOCKED_GT_24HRS                             integer,

     REPL_TASKS_GT_24HRS                              integer,

     "ACTION_TYPE"                                    character varying(6),
     "ACTION_DATE"                                    timestamp,
     "PO_TYPE"    character varying(4),
     "PURCHASE_ORG"                                   character varying(4),
     "LOAD_TSTMP"                                     timestamp
)
DISTRIBUTE ON RANDOM
;

/*
       Number of columns  8
 
    (Variable) Data Size  28 - 66
            Row Overhead  28 - 30
  ======================  =============
  Total Row Size (bytes)  56 - 96
*/

\echo *****  Adding Foreign Key Constraint:  POG_VERSION  (referencing POG_STATUS_INTACTIX)
ALTER TABLE POG_VERSION ADD Constraint REF1POG_STATUS891 FOREIGN KEY (DB_STATUS) REFERENCES POG_STATUS_INTACTIX (POG_STATUS_ID) ;
